description: This schema represents a temperature (intensity of heat)

references.description: The SNOMED code represents Temperature (observable entity)

The unit of measure of the element. Basic unit is degree Kelvin (K). Allowed values are drawn from the Temperature Units Common Synonyms (non-UCUM). The valid UCUM code is different for Celsius (C) and Fahrenheit ([degF]).
The SNOMED code represents Degrees Kelvin
The SNOMED code represents Degrees Fahrenheit
The SNOMED code represents Degrees Celsius
